summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the construction of improvements relating to the operation of electrified streetcars along Alaskan Way from South Washington Street to Broad Street (Alaskan Way Streetcar Project and Local Improvement District No.\_\_\_\_\_); authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1981 Budget of the Engineering Department; making appropriations from the Transit, Water, Guaranty Deposit and Engineering Operating Funds; and authorizing interim financing.
